settings.title: Can I use 4U by Tia on my twists and locs?
settings.text:
Absolutely! All of our products are lightweight meaning it won't weigh down your protective styles.

WHAT WE RECOMMEND: MULTI-USE HAIR OIL

Great for nourishing root to tip. Add a few drops and massage onto scalp and work your way to your ends to add shine and prevent breakage.
